Summary: luminous white ball sighted for 15 seconds
divs: Sighting DetailsThe witness passed this observation onto me while I was discussing a sighting that he had previously reported to MUFON. The witness was out on the front steps of his residence at 16 Beaver Street in San Francisco, California at 9:55 PM on July 17, 2005. He was out in an attempt to view UFO's. He spotted a luminous white ball, which he stated "was brighter than Jupiter, but about the same size". The object appeared out of a fog bank, traveling to the west. The sighting lasted approximately 15 seconds. There was a sudden change of direction as the object went from traveling straight and level to a "downward trajectory."
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Daly City
There were no other sightings in Daly City on or around July 17th 2005
